position.marginalia_text: natura disponit me[m]bra ip[s]ius foetus, sic et istud corpus rubeum est pars integralis eleisiris, seu medicina[e]. Nam in omni compositione, qua[e] fit, postq[uam] istud corpus creatum est, cadit, semper tanq[uam] pars integralis co[m]positionis, vt inferius declarabitur. Item notetis quod istud corpus habet multa no[m]i[n]a. Vocatur eni[m] Adam, A[e]stas, almagra, altun, anima, aries, aurum, cancer, Camereth, cinis tartari Cholera, Corpus propriu[m], Corpus rubeum, Corsufle, Deeb, Dehab, Ferrum, Forma, frater, Fructus, Gallus, Gophris, gumma rubea, Homo, Juventus, Kibrit, Lapis indrademus, Lapis indus, Lapis rubeus, Lux, magnesia rubea, mane, Mars, Marthek, Masculus Metros, minera, Neusi, Nutus, Oleum martis, Oleum inco[n]bustabile, Oleum rubeum, Oliva, Oriens, Pater, Reczon, rubedo, rubinus, Sal vrina[e], Sericon, SOL, sulphur rubeum, Terra rubea, Tertius, thion, Vinum, Vitellus, vitriolum rubeum, vitrum, zaaph, et etia[m] multis alijs no[min]ibus a sapie[n]tibus appelllatur: qua[e] quide[m] no[m]i[n]a no[n] sunt ei attributa secund[m] vna[m] r[ati]o[n]em, seu proportione[m]. Na[m] philosophi qui vocaveru[n]t eum Adam, a[e]state[m], Almagra, Altum, anima[m], ariete[m], auru[m], cancru[m], Carmeth, Cholera[m], cinere[m] tartari, corpus p[ro]priu[m], corsufle, Deeb, Debab, Forma[m], fratre[m], fructum, gallu[m] gophris, Homine[m] inventute[m], Kibrit, Lapidem indrademu[m]. lapide[m] indu[m], Luce[m] mane, martem/Marthek, Masculum, Metron, Minera[m], Neusim, Nutum, Olivam, Oriente[m], Patre[m], Reczon, Sal vrina[e], solem, tertium, thion, vinum, vitru[m], Zaaph, dixerunt hoc propter sua[m] complexione[m]. Na[m] o[mn]ia ha[e]c dixeru[n]t quia calida[e] et sicca[e] co[m]plexionis sunt. Qui vero vocaverunt ip[s]um corpus rubeum, gumma[m] rubea[m], lapide[m] rubeu[m], Magnesia[m] rubea[m], Oleu[m] rubeu[m], rubedine[m], Rubinu[m], seriron, Sulphur rubeu[m], Terra[m] rubeu[m]

marginalia.translation: nature disposes of the members of its offspring, so is this read body an integral part of or medicine. For in the whole composition, which is made after this body was created, always falls just as the integral part of the composition, as will be declared below. Also note that this body has many names. It is called Adam, summer, red bole, , breath, air, gold, cancer, , ashes of Tartarus, gold solder cholera, body proper, red body, gold solder, , , iron, form, brother, fruit, roster, , , man, youth, , Indian stone, red stone, light, red magnesium, morning, Mars, Marthek, male, , , , will, oil of Mars, oil , red oil, olive, East, father, , redness, ruby, salt of urine, minium, sun, red sulphur, red soil, , , wine, calf/yolk, red vitriol, woad, and also by many other names by the wise. Indeed, these names are not attributed to it according to one reasoning or proportion. For the philosophers, who call it Adam, summer, red bole, , height, breadth, ram, gold, cancer, , cholera, ashes of Tartarus, body proper, gold sodler, , , form, brother, fruit, roster, , man, youth, , , Indian stone, light, , Mars, , male, , , , will, olive, East, father, , salt of urine, sun, , , wine, woad, , they say this because of its constitution. For all these they said because there are warm and dry constitution. Truly, they called this red body, , red stone, red magnesium, red oil, redness, ruby, , red sulphur, red soil [...].
